ul.li: The Dublin Core terms Ontology: http://purl.org/dc/terms/
The Dublin Core elements Ontology: http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/
The Dublin Core abstract model Ontology: http://purl.org/dc/dcam/
The IAO (Information Artifact Ontology) Ontology: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/iao.owl
The FOAF (Friend of a Friend) Ontology: http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/
The CC (Describing copyright in RDF) Ontology: https://web.resource.org/cc/
The VOAF (Vocabulary of a Friend) Ontology: http://purl.org/vocommons/voaf
The VANN (vocabulary for annotating vocabulary descriptions) Ontology: http://purl.org/vocab/vann/
The SOSA (Sensor, Observation, Sample, and Actuator) Ontology: https://www.w3.org/ns/sosa/
The SSN (Semantic Sensor Network) Ontology: https://www.w3.org/ns/ssn/
The FRBR ("Expression of Core FRBR Concepts in RDF) Ontology: http://purl.org/vocab/frbr/core
The OGC Simple Features Ontology: http://www.opengis.net/ont/sf
